abstract: Here’s a quick guide with everything you need to know for the Hollywood Foreign Press Association film and television awards.
lead_paragraph: The 77th annual Golden Globes will be handed out Sunday at the Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills. With Ricky Gervais returning for a fifth time as the host and the awards’ general reputation for being unpredictable, it should be an interesting night. Here’s how to watch the show and other details to get up to speed:
